Public Remarks: You will appreciate this wonderful home and its excellent location in a setting of space, privacy and old-world charm on the most desirable street in San Jose, University Avenue, short distance from the famous Rosegarden park. This home shows elegance from days gone by.. Formal living room with fireplace and a large window. Open kitchen with subzero refrigerator, built in microwave and offers both an informal and an elegant dining room which overlooks the atrium. Step down to the inviting family room with fireplace, lots of built in cabinetry, and expansive floor to ceiling windows overlooking the backyard, Primary suite with dual walk-in closets, a private office with built-in desks. Primary with shower over tub. Downstairs bedroom offers extensive built-in cabinetry great for an office. Upstairs you,ll find a huge bedroom divided by a built-in cabinet closet and swinging doors creating two separate bedrooms. Private backyard with a partially covered patio and lawn area.

Public Remarks: This Queen Anne Victorian is located on a prime corner lot, nestled on a tree lined street in close proximity to the Rose Garden area. The modern kitchen features white cabinetry, modern stone countertops and sleek backsplash that provide a quality finish. The high ceilings and detailed wood work that can be found throughout this home are a rare find in homes of today. Downstairs the well sized three bedrooms and the updated two full bathrooms are ample in size and continued quality finish work to meet todays needs. The connected living room and dining room provide character and continued charm, with a fireplace dated back to 1892. The plentiful storage and space are well appreciated. The abundance of natural light, open floor plan and hardwood floors throughout are ready to enjoy. The upstairs provides a built-in office, game room and loft with storage room. The two covered porches provide charm and relaxation ready to enjoy. Come see what makes this home and community so special!

Public Remarks: Old-world charm in Rose Garden! This lovingly restored Art-Deco-inspired home boasts classic 1940s architecture. Pie-shaped entry w/glass brick windows, spacious living room w/hardwood floors & cozy fireplace. Formal dining room, rear family room w/wood paneling, extra large sliding glass door & wet bar that opens to the backyard. The updated kitchen features granite counters & stainless steel appliances. Full bathroom & bedroom/den on the ground floor is ideal for multigenerational living. Upstairs, each bedroom possesses unique features such as private balconies, walk-in closets, or built-in furniture. Both upstairs bathrooms boast mid-century charm. Outside, the grounds cater to entertaining. Front courtyard w/fire pit is sheltered by a spherical brick privacy wall. Backyard offers a built-in BBQ, patio & deck. 2-car attached garage & well-sized storage shed/workshop. Steps to The Alameda, close proximity of Google's new Downtown Village. Property may be eligible for commercial-use.

Public Remarks: Offered for the first time in 45 years, this gracious and well-kept home is ready for its next caretakers. Street appeal is in abundance between the brick facade and drought tolerant, always green artificial lawn. Inside, the large formal living room and formal dining room welcome guests while the kitchen with custom cabinetry and family room are bathed in natural light. The three bedrooms have easy access to the two full bathrooms offering flexibility for family, guests or roommates, plus a half bathroom near the kitchen is convenient to the patio for parties. Multiple doors open onto the expansive covered patio in the back yard for year-round outdoor enjoyment. Extra storage is available in the 2-car garage as well as the partial basement. Don't miss this opportunity to move to one of the best blocks in the venerable Rose Garden neighborhood!

Nestled on a tree lined street in the highly desirable Rose Garden neighborhood and convenient to shopping, dining, entertainment, freeway access and public transportation.

The homeowners meticulously crafted everything down to the smallest details, from the impressive formal entryway with custom-built front door, raised ceiling and niches for your prized artwork. The spacious open floor plan lives large with its well-appointed chefs kitchen, timeless designer amenities, island, abundance of cabinetry, subway tile backsplash, Thermador appliances and Perlick wine cooler. The adjoining living room has soaring ceilings, sleek gas fireplace, and a wall of glass overlooking the spa-like rear yard with pool and built-in BBQ area. Adjacent to the sparkling pool is a fully equipped pool house with a kitchenette, washer/dryer, an additional bedroom if desired and full bath.The generous first-floor primary suite is a true retreat with fireplace, walk-in closet with built-ins, steam shower, heated floors and dual sinks. An additional junior en-suite on the first floor as well. Two additional bedrooms and a full bath round out the second level. Easy commute access to Silicon Valley companies, Zanotto's, shopping, O'Connor hospital and restaurants.

This charming two-story home is located on one of the best streets in the Rose Garden, just blocks from the Rose Garden park, library, Zanotto's, Bill's, Starbucks and the local public/private schools. The kitchen was remodeled in 2018/2019 with new kitchen cabinets, Carrara marble counters, Bertazzoni stainless gas range/hood, dishwasher and Liebherr refrigerator. The oversized living room features a wood-burning fireplace with marble mantle and nearly floor-to-ceiling windows looking out to the beautiful backyard. The dining area is located between the kitchen and living room. On the second floor, there are two spacious bedrooms (each with a walk-in closet and attic storage closet), a full bathroom (separate shower stall/separate bathtub) and office area. On the first floor, there is a bedroom, half-bathroom and laundry area. The bathrooms were remodeled in 2018/2019. Hardwood floors throughout. Basement with furnace/water heater. Finished detached garage. New front/back lawns. AC.
Showing Instruction: Please do not park on driveway

Confidential Remarks: Property is tenant occupied, will be delivered vacant by close of escrow. Please contact listing agent with 24 hours notice for showings - tenants prefer Tuesday/Thursday for showing. No showings prior to open house on 1/8/23
Public Remarks: This 2,400 SF home on a 6,000 sf lot is awaiting your personal touch! Historic 1920s home with early 2000s era addition contains 3 bedrooms, downstairs den, and 3 bathrooms. This oversized lot contains a detached garage which is perfect for conversation to an ADU, home office, or continued use as a storage space. Cathedral ceilings in entry living room, as well as upstairs bedroom, give the home the feeling of space and height. Open concept kitchen/family room/dining room is perfect for entertaining, with access through sliding double door access to the backyard patio - easy indoor/outdoor living and entertaining possibilities! Upstairs, two bedrooms contain balconies overlooking the neighborhood and yard, respectively. Third bedroom with cathedral ceilings, natural light e\and plant shelf - great for your indoor green thumb. Two upstairs bathrooms, including hall and primary suite. This home just needs your personalized cosmetic touch to make it your own!
Showing Instruction: First showings to begin after first public open house on 1/8/23. Tenants prefer Tuesday/Thursday showings. Lockbox on gate behind driveway on left.
